page.syntax: Info as C = EXPRESSION_INFO(C expr,C property)

argument.name: expr
argument.description: An Xbasic expression referring to a table or set in the current session.r

list.name: type
list.description: Returns, C - character, N - numeric, D - date, or L - logical, depending on the type of the expression.

list.name: ref_table
list.description: Returns "T" if the expression refers to any fields from a table. A simple expression (e.g. "1 + 2") would return "F" since there are no fields from tables involved.

list.name: ref_children
list.description: Returns "T" if the expression involves fields from a child table.

list.name: ref_one_to_manys
list.description: Returns "T" if the expression involves field from a one-to-many child table.

page.description: Takes an expression and gets information about it. type - expression type ref_tabl - 'T' if references any table eref_children - 'T' if references children ref_one_to_manys - 'T' if references one-to-many children table_names - tables referenced field_names - field referencedleaves - leaf expression (conditional)
page.discussion: EXPRESSION_INFO() returns information about an Expression. The type of information returned is specified by Property. The expression must refer to a table or set in the current session.
